response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. After careful consideration, we have decided to offer this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $1,300,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value of $1,500,000 and provides an opportunity for you to maximize your investment without compromising on quality.

I understand that you are looking for a product worth $1,200,000 to you, and with this offer, you would be acquiring it at a price that is higher than its perceived value to you, making it an excellent deal. Our product comes with a comprehensive warranty and dedicated customer support to ensure a smooth integration into your business processes.

Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to discuss the details of this offer. We are committed to providing you with the best possible service and support throughout the entire process.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1300000}
